original_title: Man dies after being shot in Thalawathugoda
original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): A person who was seriously injured in a shooting at a house in Welipara, Thalawathugoda Battaramulla has died.
Sri Lanka police say two people on a motorcycle had shot at him last night and fled the area.
The deceased has been identified as a 41-year-old resident of Weli Para, Thalawathugoda.
The injured was admitted to the Sri Jayawardenapura General Hospital last night.
